page.title: 04SHOPPING SURVEY:CLEADON
page.content: To do our shopping survey we inter- viewed people shopping and shop- keepers.This is a small sample of village shoppers. Laws'Supermarket_most people shop twice a week.Newsagents_customers call in every day.Bakers_people like fresh bread and shop six days a week. Green- grocers_people buy fresh fruit and vegetables nearly every day.Fish- monger_fish seems to be bought once a week. We have the only equestrian shop in the area.When I lived in North York- shire my mam sent to this shop for my riding hat and boots.Other customers come from as far away as Durham, Tyneside and Consett.Thursday is the busiest day as the shop is open until 7 p.m. It looks like a tack room and smells of leather.
